language.entry: I see everything, I feel everything...
Don't worry, just look into my eyes.
Close your eyes... Feel the wind... Now breathe...
"I discovered its twisted mentality behind that corporeal shell."

The mix of her innate ability along with years of training have endowed the fortune-teller with various psychic abilities, chaotic and enhanced by her fragile state of mind, it allows her both to calm the will of his companions and confuse the thoughts of entities with mentalities very different from the human.

The fortune-teller does not own or need any armor, because her extreme senses allow her to notice most of the dangers and her fine clothes endow her with an enviable speed and stealth. She also has it's inseparable crystal ball that enhances her abilities allowing to unleash chaos in the enemy ranks.

The fortune-teller rarely allows herself to have a pleasant rest, when the fires of the battle die out she will use her abilities to be better prepared for the future, even if it costs a part of her mental health.

A caravan of unfortunates have decided to try their luck here, most will try to win some miserable coins and then continue with their nomadic life, although perhaps someone of them decides to stay here.
A traveler without a country, who has put her luck to the test through forecasts, some true but many false. Will she know what fate awaits in this damned land?
I shouldn't have joined this campaign
[I can't fight against so much darkness
I know what you plan to do...
I know what will happen and it's not good
I must see what my magic ball shows all the time
They come for me, isn't it?
Are these my thoughts or someone else's?
I will break my mind in order to survive
Physical pain will not stop me
The psychic effort will strengthen me
The only one with superior intellect here is me!
Calming your concerns... a wasting of my skills...
Suffer and feed my power with your torment
I should never have joined these inferior beings.
Leave me alone! Like all my people
The ball shows me nothing, just darkness...
This is our end, I know it
Do you also hear those voices?
I see the world as it is, and it's overwhelming!
My mind! I feel it tear, second by second!
Everything will get worse, I know.
NO! The crystal ball must be wrong.
Damn it for knowing what will happen.
I can hear them even if they don't speak.
My ball shows many things. But which one will happen?
It will not be easy to get out of this situation.
We'll endure their claws attacks until they lose their edge!
We need to suffer to succeed.
Do I have to force you to fight?
Do you want me to tell you what I see in your future? Ha...
Does anyone want me to relive their worst nightmare?
If I absorb your nightmares I will be stronger
I can manipulate your minds as I feel like it
Our negative thoughts prevent us from victory
It's useless, I already see our downfall
My magic ball does not show a promising future
... interesting thoughts are hiding my comrades.
Do you not see the same as me? Run away!
In physical combat I will die, better back off
Here I will be safe ... I'm sure
I hope they find it difficult to see me from so far away.
Could they see me from here?
My beautiful family! Long time no see.
You call me, Mother? Soon I will go with you...
Father, get away from me... please...
It would have been better to continue living on alms.
I will stay here until we are all killed.
I remind you that I am no warrior.
Like my people, I will survive by running away.
Premeditated action is usually easily recognized.
I don't care if I end hurt here.
My life is hanging by a thread no matter what I do.
My destiny will not change, no matter what I do.
Do I have to take care of everything?
None of you will give me orders.
My mental capacity prevents me from making mistakes.
So much planning to delay the inevitable...
Meditating my actions will not improve this situation.
Bad omens I see in my crystal ball.
I perceive dozens of entities, although I can't see them...
I can't rest while looking at me...
Mmh ... I feel a sudden change in your thinking.
My senses will sharpen the longer I am awake.
This is not a break, better prepare for what's coming.
I will prevent you from resting to see if your performances improves.
This could be our last meal...
One last earthly rest before eternal rest.
Come if you dare dark beasts!
Pierce my flesh! I dare you!
I'd rather die than continue to feel the suffering of my comrades.
Did you want to attack me?
You! Don't even think about it!
You won't do anything if I attack you first.
Must I hurt you to focus?
I don't want to suffer anymore!
If I turn my back they will stab me.
They are preparing an ambush, I know.
It's useless to escape, they'll kill us when we turn our backs on them.
I'd rather die looking at my executor in the face.
I have to give everything, even if it costs me my life!
I think I shouldn't do that ... Or maybe do it?
Move your ass even once, for a change.
Take away that thing from me.
Did anyone check that this thing works?
I don't need any artifact to survive.
What do you intend to do to me?
I don't trust your way of practicing medicine.
My people have better methods to heal.
Useless patches for a fatal wound...
What are you trying to do to me?
I don't need neither I want your help.
This is not what I planned to happen.
I cannot rest... I canoot rest... I CANNOT REST!
We all think the same, this challenge can be surpassed
Our goal is clear and resonates in unison in our minds
Focused and calm, we will move as a unit.
I feel higher energies working in our favor!
My intellect is my best weapon
Everything will be fine, I know it.
My crystal ball shows good omens
Everything will be fine, I know!
Let's stay focused and we'll get through this battle
It was you! The one who showed me all those visions!
Free me from this corporeal carcass
I will put you all in a comatose state! I swear.
Lo veo todo, lo siento todo...
No se preocupen, solo mirenme fijamente.
Cierra tus ojos... Siente el viento... Ahora respira...
"Descrubrí una retorcida mentalidad detrás de esa caparazón corporal."

La mezcla de su habilidad innata junto con años de entrenamiento han dotado a la adivina de diversas habilidades psiquicas, caoticas y potenciadas por su fragil estado mental, le permiten tanto calmar las voluntades de sus compañeros como inclusive confundir los pensamientos de entes con mentalidades muy diferentes a la del humano.

La adivina no posee ni necesita de armadura alguna, pues sus extremos sentidos le permiten advertir la mayoría de los peligros y sus finas ropas la dotan de una envidiable velocidad y sigilo. Además posee su inseparable bola de cristal que potencia sus habilidades permitiendo desatar el caos en filas enemigas.

La adivina rara vez se permite tener un descanso placentero, cuando los fuegos de la batalla se extinguen ella usará sus habilidades para estar mejor preparados en el futuro, aunque eso le cueste una parte de su salud mental.

Una caravana de infortunados han decidido probar su suerte aquí, la mayoría intentará ganar unas miseras monedas para luego seguir con su vida nómada, aunque quizás alguno que otro decida quedarse aquí.
Una viajante sin patria, que ha puesto a prueba su suerte mediante presagios, algunas verdaderas pero muchas falsas. ¿Sabrá que destino le espera en esta condenada tierra?
No debí sumarme a esta campaña
Ya sé lo que piensan hacer...
Sé lo que sucederá y no es bueno
debo ver lo que muestre la bola mágica en todo momento
Vienen por mí, no es cierto?
Son acaso estos mis pensamientos o los de alquién más?
Romperé mi mente con tal de sobrevivir
Este sufrimiento me ayuda a enfocarme
El dolor físico no me detendrá
La única con capacidades intelectuales superiores soy yo!
Calmar sus inquietudes, que malgasto de mis habilidades...
Sufran y alimenten mi poder con su tormento
Nunca debí juntarme con estos seres inferiores.
dejenme sola! Como a todo mi pueblo
La bola no me muestra nada, solo oscuridad...
Este es nuestro fín, yo lo sé
Veo el mundo como es, y es abrumador!
Mi mente! Siento como se desgarra segundo a segundo!
NO! La bola de cristal debe estar equivocada.
Máldita sea por saber lo que pasará.
Mi bola muestra muchas cosas. ¿Cuáles sucederán?
No será facil salir de esta situación.
Atravecemos sus garras hasta que pierdan su filo!
Es necesario que sufra para triunfar.
¿Quieren que les cuente lo que veo en su futuro? Ha.. ha.. ha..
¿Alguien quiere que le haga revivir su peor pesadilla?
Si absorbo sus pesadillas seré más fuerte
Puedo manipular sus mentes como se me dé la gana
Nuestros pensamientos negativos nos impiden la victoria
Mi bola mágica no muestra un futuro prometedor
¿Acaso no ven lo mismo que yo? Huyan!
En combate físico moriré, mejor retroceder
Espero que se les dificule verme desde tan lejos.
Elijanme a mí! no valgo nada.
Mi bella familia! Tanto tiempo sin verlos.
Me llamas Madre? Pronto iré contigo.
Padre, alejate de mi… por favor…
Hubiera estado mejor seguir viviendo de limosnas.
Me quedaré aquí hasta que nos maten a todos.
Les recuerdo que no soy ninguna guerrera.
Al igual que mi pueblo, sobreviviré huyendo.
La acción premeditada suele ser reconocida facilmente.
Ya no me importa si resulto herida aquí.
Mi vida pende de un hilo sin importar que haga
Mi destino no cambiará, no importa lo que haga.
¿Acaso tengo que hacerme cargo de todo yo?
Ninguno de ustedes me dará ordenes.
Mi capacidad mental me impide equivocarme.
Tanta planificación para retrasar lo inevitable...
Que medite mis acciones no mejorará esta situación.
Malos augurios veo en mi bola de cristal.
Percibo decenas de entes, aunque no pueda verlos…
No puedo descansar mientras me miran…
Mmh… presiento un repentino cambio en su forma de pensar.
Mis sentidos se agudizarán mientras más tiempo esté despierta.
Esto no es un descanso, mejor preparense para lo que viene.
Impediré que descansen para ver si mejoran su rendimiento.
Esta podría ser nuestra última cena…
Un último descanso terrenal antes del descanso eterno.
Prefiero morir a seguir sintiendo el sufrimiento de mis camaradas.
No haras nada si yo te ataco primero.
¿Acaso debo lastimarte para que te enfoques?
Si les doy la espalda me apuñalarán.
Es inútil escapar, nos matarán cuando les demos la espalda.
Prefiero morir mirando a mi ejecutor a la cara.
Hay que darlo todo, aunque me cueste la vida!
Creo que no debo hacer eso... ¿O sí?
Muevan el trasero ustedes aunque sea una vez, para variar.
Quíta de mi vista esa cosa
No necesito de ningún artefacto para sobrevivir.
No confio en tu forma de ejercer la médicina.
Ni necesito, ni quiero tu ayuda.
Esto no es lo que tenía previsto que pasara.
No puedo descansar... ¡No puedo descansar... NO PUEDO DESCANSAR!
Todos pensamos lo mismo, este desafio es superable
Nuestro objetivo es claro y resuena al unísono en nuestras mentes
Con calma y concrentación, nos moveremos como una unidad.
¡Siento energias superiores trabajando a nuestro favor!
Mi intelecto es mi mejor arma
Mi bola de cristal muestra buenos augurios
Mantengamonos concentrados y superaremos esta batalla
Eras tú! Quién me mostraba todas esas visiones!
Voy a ponerlos en un estado comatoso, lo prometo.
Я могу видеть всё, я могу почувствовать всё...
Не отвлекайтесь, просто смотрите мне в глаза.
Закрой глаза... Почувствуй дуновение ветра... Дыши глубоко...
"Я познала искажённую правду, что прячется за скорлупой реальности."

Смесь её врождённых способностей вместе с годами тренировок наделили Предсказательницу судеб множеством телепатических способностей, хаотичных, но как никогда могущественных, питаемых её шатким разумом. Они помогают ей как успокоить своих компаньонов, так и запутать мысли тех существ, чьё мышление сильно разнится с человеческим.

Предсказательница не имеет и не нуждается в латной броне, поскольку её обострённые чувства позволяют замечать большинство опасностей наперёд, где ей под стать будут лёгкие одежды для проворности и скрытности. При себе она так же держит хрустальный шар, с которым не расстаётся ни на минуту, который помогает ей фокусировать свою силу, направляя хаос в сторону вражеской линии.

Предсказательница будущего редко позволяет себе столь желанный отдых. Когда огни битвы стихают, она использует свои способности дабы быть во всеоружии в будущем, хоть и осознаёт что за это придётся расплатиться рассудком.
Караван заполненый бедолагами решил попытать здесь своё счастье. Многие останутся довольны своими грошами и продолжат свою жизнь кочевников, однако, кажется, некоторые из них решают остаться.
Путешественник без родины, что решил испытать судьбу предсказаниями, которые могут быть как и правдой, но чаще, всё же, ложью. Знает ли она свою судьбу, что ждёт её в этих проклятых землях?
Не стоило мне присоединяться к этой кампании.
[Я не могу сражаться против зияющей тьмы.
Я знаю что ты собрался сделать...
Я вижу будущее и в этом нет ничего хорошего.
Я должна увидеть что мой магический шар показывает всё время.
Это мои мысли или чьи-то ещё?
Я сломаю свой разум что бы выжить.
Физическая боль не сможет меня остановить.
Способность к ясновидению придаст мне сил.
Единственный человек с превосходным интеллектом здесь Я!
Они сомневаются во мне... Зря я трачу на них свои силы...
Страдайте! Моя сила питается вашими муками.
Не стоило мне присоединяться к столь жалким созданиям.
Оставь меня в покое! Как и весь мой народ!
Шар ничего не показывает. Лишь непроглядную тьму...
Это наш конец, я его уже видела.
Ты ведь тоже слышишь эти голоса?
Я вижу мир таким, какой он на самом деле. И он ужасен!
Мой разум! Я чувствую как он разваливается на части, трещит и плавится!
Всё будет только хуже, я уже знаю это.
НЕТ! Хрустальный шар, должно быть, оказался не прав!
Будь я проклята за то, что уже знаю нашу судьбу.
Даже и не думай об этом больше.
Я слышу их даже если они не открывают рта.
Мой шар показывает множество вещей. Но какие из них действительно реальны?
Будет совсем не просто выбраться из этой ситуации.
Мы будем терпеть их когти пока они не ослабнут!
Что бы достичь желаемого мы должны страдать.
Уверен что ДЕЙСТВИТЕЛЬНО хочешь знать что тебя ждёт? Ха...
Кто-нибудь хочешь пережить свой самый страшный кошмар вновь?
Если я поглощу твои кошмары, то стану в разы сильнее.
Я могу манипулировать вашими сознаниями как захочу.
Наши негативные мысли не дают нам победить.
Это бесполезно, я уже вижу нашу погибель.
Магический шар показывает худшую из возможных судеб.
...Интересные мысли закрались в головы моих товарищей.
Неужели вы не видите то, что вижу я? Бегите!
В битве на мечах мне конец, лучше будет отступить.
Здесь я в безопасности... Я уверена.
Надеюсь они не заметят меня если я буду стоять так далеко.
Смогут ли они увидеть меня отсюда?
Родные! Мама! Папа! Сколько лет, сколько зим.
Отец, я сделаю всё что ты прикажешь.
Ты звала меня, Мама? Скоро я буду с тобой...
Я хочу первой отойти в мир иной.
Лучше бы я продолжила жить побираясь.
Я останусь здесь пока нас всех не перебьют.
Напоминаю вам, что Я - не воин.
Как и люди моего народа, я спасусь бегством!
Я не дам вашему сговору свершиться!
Меня не волнует будет это один порез или тысяча.
Моя жизнь весит на волоске что бы я не делала.
Моя судьба не измениться что бы я не делала.
Мне снова самой со всем разбираться?
Мои острый ум просто не позволит мне совершить ошибку.
Столько планов что бы отсрочить неизбежное...
Медитация над каждым шагом уже ничем не поможет.
Ни один план здесь не поможет.
Недоброе будущее показывает мой хрустальный шар.
Я чувствую тысячи сущностей, но ни одну из них не вижу глазами...
Я не могу спать пока вы пялитесь на меня...
Хммммм... Я почувствовала резкую смену настроения в твоих мыслях.
Пока я не сплю, мои чувства обостряются всё сильней и сильней.
Это не передышка, лучше готовьтесь к тому, что нас ждёт.
Я не дам тебе уснуть. Может хоть сонный ты сражаешься лучше.
Это может быть наша последняя трапеза...
Один небольшой привал перед вечным сном.
Подходите коли не боитесь, вы, тёмные твари!
Пронзи мою плоть! Я приказываю тебе!
Я лучше умру чем буду чувствовать страдания моих товарищей.
Ты! Даже и не смей думать об этом!
Ты мне ничего не сделаешь если я нанесу удар первой!
Мне тебя нужно треснуть что бы ты сосредоточился?
Если повернусь, то вы непременно зарежете меня.
Убегать бесполезно. Они убьют нас как только мы подставим спины.
Я лучше умру зная лицо своего палача.
Я должна отдать всё, даже если это моя жизнь!
Нет! Мне лучше оставаться на месте...
Я, вроде, и не должна этого делать... Или так и задумано?
Ни одна душа не сдвинется с места.
А может, ради разнообразия, ты подвинешь СВОЮ задницу?
Кто-нибудь проверил эту шутку? Она вообще работает?
Мне не нужны ни какие артефакты что бы выжить.
Что ты собрался делать со мной?
У моего народа методы исцеления куда практичнее.
Бесполезные перевязки и без того смертельных ран...
Не трать на меня своё время...
Что ты собрался делать со мной?
Мне не нужна ни твоя жалость, ни твоя помощь.
Это не то, что я видела в нашем будущем...
Не закрывать глаза... Не закрывать глаза... НЕ ЗАКРЫВАТЬ ГЛАЗА!
Я не могу больше это терпеть...
Мы думаем об одном и том же, этот вызов нам точно по плечу!
Наша цель, что ясна каждому, в унисон звучит в наших сердцах.
Сосредоточенны и спокойны, мы движемся как одно целое.
Я чувствую что высшие силы благосклонны к нам!
Всё будет в порядке, уж кому как мне не знать.
Мой хрустальный шар показывает благие знамения.
Каждый из нас выберется от сюда, я вижу это!
Соберись, ход этой битвы в наших руках.
Работая вместе нас никто не остановит.
Это был ты! Тот, кто показывал мне все эти видения!
Free me from this corporeal carcass
I will put you all in a comatose state! I swear.
I see everything, I feel everything...
Don't worry, just look into my eyes.
Close your eyes... Feel the wind... Now breathe...
"I discovered its twisted mentality behind that corporeal shell."

The mix of her innate ability along with years of training have endowed the fortune-teller with various psychic abilities, chaotic and enhanced by her fragile state of mind, it allows her both to calm the will of his companions and confuse the thoughts of entities with mentalities very different from the human.

The fortune-teller does not own or need any armor, because her extreme senses allow her to notice most of the dangers and her fine clothes endow her with an enviable speed and stealth. She also has it's inseparable crystal ball that enhances her abilities allowing to unleash chaos in the enemy ranks.

The fortune-teller rarely allows herself to have a pleasant rest, when the fires of the battle die out she will use her abilities to be better prepared for the future, even if it costs a part of her mental health.

A caravan of unfortunates have decided to try their luck here, most will try to win some miserable coins and then continue with their nomadic life, although perhaps someone of them decides to stay here.
A traveler without a country, who has put her luck to the test through forecasts, some true but many false. Will she know what fate awaits her in this damned land?
I shouldn't have joined this campaign
[I can't fight against so much darkness
I know what you plan to do...
I know what will happen and it's not good
I must see what my magic ball shows all the time
They come for me, isn't it?
Are these my thoughts or someone else's?
I will break my mind in order to survive
Physical pain will not stop me
The psychic effort will strengthen me
The only one with superior intellect here is me!
Calming your concerns... a wasting of my skills...
Suffer and feed my power with your torment
I should never have joined these inferior beings.
Leave me alone! Like all my people
The ball shows me nothing, just darkness...
This is our end, I know it
Do you also hear those voices?
I see the world as it is, and it's overwhelming!
My mind! I feel it tear, second by second!
Everything will get worse, I know.
NO! The crystal ball must be wrong.
Damn it for knowing what will happen.
I can hear them even if they don't speak.
My ball shows many things. But which one will happen?
It will not be easy to get out of this situation.
We'll endure their claws attacks until they lose their edge!
We need to suffer to succeed.
Do I have to force you to fight?
Do you want me to tell you what I see in your future? Ha...
Does anyone want me to relive their worst nightmare?
If I absorb your nightmares I will be stronger
I can manipulate your minds as I feel like it
Our negative thoughts prevent us from victory
It's useless, I already see our downfall
My magic ball does not show a promising future
... interesting thoughts are hiding my comrades.
Do you not see the same as me? Run away!
In physical combat I will die, better back off
Here I will be safe ... I'm sure
I hope they find it difficult to see me from so far away.
Could they see me from here?
My beautiful family! Long time no see.
You call me, Mother? Soon I will go with you...
Father, get away from me... please...
It would have been better to continue living on alms.
I will stay here until we are all killed.
I remind you that I am no warrior.
Like my people, I will survive by running away.
Premeditated action is usually easily recognized.
I don't care if I end hurt here.
My life is hanging by a thread no matter what I do.
My destiny will not change, no matter what I do.
Do I have to take care of everything?
None of you will give me orders.
My mental capacity prevents me from making mistakes.
So much planning to delay the inevitable...
Meditating my actions will not improve this situation.
Bad omens I see in my crystal ball.
I perceive dozens of entities, although I can't see them...
I can't rest while looking at me...
Mmh ... I feel a sudden change in your thinking.
My senses will sharpen the longer I am awake.
This is not a break, better prepare for what's coming.
I will prevent you from resting to see if your performances improves.
This could be our last meal...
One last earthly rest before eternal rest.
Come if you dare dark beasts!
Pierce my flesh! I dare you!
I'd rather die than continue to feel the suffering of my comrades.
Did you want to attack me?
You! Don't even think about it!
You won't do anything if I attack you first.
Must I hurt you to focus?
I don't want to suffer anymore!
If I turn my back they will stab me.
They are preparing an ambush, I know.
It's useless to escape, they'll kill us when we turn our backs on them.
I'd rather die looking at my executor in the face.
I have to give everything, even if it costs me my life!
I think I shouldn't do that ... Or maybe do it?
Move your ass even once, for a change.
Take away that thing from me.
Did anyone check that this thing works?
I don't need any artifact to survive.
What do you intend to do to me?
I don't trust your way of practicing medicine.
My people have better methods to heal.
Useless patches for a fatal wound...
What are you trying to do to me?
I don't need neither I want your help.
This is not what I planned to happen.
I cannot rest... I canoot rest... I CANNOT REST!
We all think the same, this challenge can be surpassed
Our goal is clear and resonates in unison in our minds
Focused and calm, we will move as a unit.
I feel higher energies working in our favor!
My intellect is my best weapon
Everything will be fine, I know it.
My crystal ball shows good omens
Everything will be fine, I know!
Let's stay focused and we'll get through this battle
It was you! The one who showed me all those visions!
Free me from this corporeal carcass
I will put you all in a comatose state! I swear.
I see everything, I feel everything...
Don't worry, just look into my eyes.
Close your eyes... Feel the wind... Now breathe...
"I discovered its twisted mentality behind that corporeal shell."

The mix of her innate ability along with years of training have endowed the fortune-teller with various psychic abilities, chaotic and enhanced by her fragile state of mind, it allows her both to calm the will of his companions and confuse the thoughts of entities with mentalities very different from the human.

The fortune-teller does not own or need any armor, because her extreme senses allow her to notice most of the dangers and her fine clothes endow her with an enviable speed and stealth. She also has it's inseparable crystal ball that enhances her abilities allowing to unleash chaos in the enemy ranks.

The fortune-teller rarely allows herself to have a pleasant rest, when the fires of the battle die out she will use her abilities to be better prepared for the future, even if it costs a part of her mental health.

A caravan of unfortunates have decided to try their luck here, most will try to win some miserable coins and then continue with their nomadic life, although perhaps someone of them decides to stay here.
A traveler without a country, who has put her luck to the test through forecasts, some true but many false. Will she know what fate awaits her in this damned land?
I shouldn't have joined this campaign
[I can't fight against so much darkness
I know what you plan to do...
I know what will happen and it's not good
I must see what my magic ball shows all the time
They come for me, isn't it?
Are these my thoughts or someone else's?
I will break my mind in order to survive
Physical pain will not stop me
The psychic effort will strengthen me
The only one with superior intellect here is me!
Calming your concerns... a wasting of my skills...
Suffer and feed my power with your torment
I should never have joined these inferior beings.
Leave me alone! Like all my people
The ball shows me nothing, just darkness...
This is our end, I know it
Do you also hear those voices?
I see the world as it is, and it's overwhelming!
My mind! I feel it tear, second by second!
Everything will get worse, I know.
NO! The crystal ball must be wrong.
Damn it for knowing what will happen.
I can hear them even if they don't speak.
My ball shows many things. But which one will happen?
It will not be easy to get out of this situation.
We'll endure their claws attacks until they lose their edge!
We need to suffer to succeed.
Do I have to force you to fight?
Do you want me to tell you what I see in your future? Ha...
Does anyone want me to relive their worst nightmare?
If I absorb your nightmares I will be stronger
I can manipulate your minds as I feel like it
Our negative thoughts prevent us from victory
It's useless, I already see our downfall
My magic ball does not show a promising future
... interesting thoughts are hiding my comrades.
Do you not see the same as me? Run away!
In physical combat I will die, better back off
Here I will be safe ... I'm sure
I hope they find it difficult to see me from so far away.
Could they see me from here?
My beautiful family! Long time no see.
You call me, Mother? Soon I will go with you...
Father, get away from me... please...
It would have been better to continue living on alms.
I will stay here until we are all killed.
I remind you that I am no warrior.
Like my people, I will survive by running away.
Premeditated action is usually easily recognized.
I don't care if I end hurt here.
My life is hanging by a thread no matter what I do.
My destiny will not change, no matter what I do.
Do I have to take care of everything?
None of you will give me orders.
My mental capacity prevents me from making mistakes.
So much planning to delay the inevitable...
Meditating my actions will not improve this situation.
Bad omens I see in my crystal ball.
I perceive dozens of entities, although I can't see them...
I can't rest while looking at me...
Mmh ... I feel a sudden change in your thinking.
My senses will sharpen the longer I am awake.
This is not a break, better prepare for what's coming.
I will prevent you from resting to see if your performances improves.
This could be our last meal...
One last earthly rest before eternal rest.
Come if you dare dark beasts!
Pierce my flesh! I dare you!
I'd rather die than continue to feel the suffering of my comrades.
Did you want to attack me?
You! Don't even think about it!
You won't do anything if I attack you first.
Must I hurt you to focus?
I don't want to suffer anymore!
If I turn my back they will stab me.
They are preparing an ambush, I know.
It's useless to escape, they'll kill us when we turn our backs on them.
I'd rather die looking at my executor in the face.

I don't trust your way of practicing medicine.
My people have better methods to heal.
Useless patches for a fatal wound...

I cannot rest... I canoot rest... I CANNOT REST!

I will put you all in a comatose state! I swear.
I see everything, I feel everything...
Don't worry, just look into my eyes.
Close your eyes... Feel the wind... Now breathe...
"I discovered its twisted mentality behind that corporeal shell."

The mix of her innate ability along with years of training have endowed the fortune-teller with various psychic abilities, chaotic and enhanced by her fragile state of mind, it allows her both to calm the will of his companions and confuse the thoughts of entities with mentalities very different from the human.

The fortune-teller does not own or need any armor, because her extreme senses allow her to notice most of the dangers and her fine clothes endow her with an enviable speed and stealth. She also has it's inseparable crystal ball that enhances her abilities allowing to unleash chaos in the enemy ranks.

The fortune-teller rarely allows herself to have a pleasant rest, when the fires of the battle die out she will use her abilities to be better prepared for the future, even if it costs a part of her mental health.

A caravan of unfortunates have decided to try their luck here, most will try to win some miserable coins and then continue with their nomadic life, although perhaps someone of them decides to stay here.
A traveler without a country, who has put her luck to the test through forecasts, some true but many false. Will she know what fate awaits her in this damned land?
I shouldn't have joined this campaign
[I can't fight against so much darkness
I know what you plan to do...
I know what will happen and it's not good
I must see what my magic ball shows all the time
They come for me, isn't it?
Are these my thoughts or someone else's?
I will break my mind in order to survive
Physical pain will not stop me
The psychic effort will strengthen me
The only one with superior intellect here is me!
Calming your concerns... a wasting of my skills...
Suffer and feed my power with your torment
I should never have joined these inferior beings.
Leave me alone! Like all my people
The ball shows me nothing, just darkness...
This is our end, I know it
Do you also hear those voices?
I see the world as it is, and it's overwhelming!
My mind! I feel it tear, second by second!
Everything will get worse, I know.
NO! The crystal ball must be wrong.
Damn it for knowing what will happen.
I can hear them even if they don't speak.
My ball shows many things. But which one will happen?
It will not be easy to get out of this situation.
We'll endure their claws attacks until they lose their edge!
We need to suffer to succeed.
Do I have to force you to fight?
Do you want me to tell you what I see in your future? Ha...
Does anyone want me to relive their worst nightmare?
If I absorb your nightmares I will be stronger
I can manipulate your minds as I feel like it
Our negative thoughts prevent us from victory
It's useless, I already see our downfall
My magic ball does not show a promising future
... interesting thoughts are hiding my comrades.
Do you not see the same as me? Run away!
In physical combat I will die, better back off
Here I will be safe ... I'm sure
I hope they find it difficult to see me from so far away.
Could they see me from here?
My beautiful family! Long time no see.
You call me, Mother? Soon I will go with you...
Father, get away from me... please...
It would have been better to continue living on alms.
I will stay here until we are all killed.
I remind you that I am no warrior.
Like my people, I will survive by running away.
Premeditated action is usually easily recognized.
I don't care if I end hurt here.
My life is hanging by a thread no matter what I do.
My destiny will not change, no matter what I do.
Do I have to take care of everything?
None of you will give me orders.
My mental capacity prevents me from making mistakes.
So much planning to delay the inevitable...
Meditating my actions will not improve this situation.
Bad omens I see in my crystal ball.
I perceive dozens of entities, although I can't see them...
I can't rest while looking at me...
Mmh ... I feel a sudden change in your thinking.
My senses will sharpen the longer I am awake.
This is not a break, better prepare for what's coming.
I will prevent you from resting to see if your performances improves.
This could be our last meal...
One last earthly rest before eternal rest.
Come if you dare dark beasts!
Pierce my flesh! I dare you!
I'd rather die than continue to feel the suffering of my comrades.
Did you want to attack me?
You! Don't even think about it!
You won't do anything if I attack you first.
Must I hurt you to focus?
I don't want to suffer anymore!
If I turn my back they will stab me.
They are preparing an ambush, I know.
It's useless to escape, they'll kill us when we turn our backs on them.
I'd rather die looking at my executor in the face.
I have to give everything, even if it costs me my life!
I think I shouldn't do that ... Or maybe do it?
Move your ass even once, for a change.
Take away that thing from me.
Did anyone check that this thing works?
I don't need any artifact to survive.
What do you intend to do to me?
I don't trust your way of practicing medicine.
My people have better methods to heal.
Useless patches for a fatal wound...
What are you trying to do to me?
I don't need neither I want your help.
This is not what I planned to happen.
I cannot rest... I canoot rest... I CANNOT REST!
We all think the same, this challenge can be surpassed
Our goal is clear and resonates in unison in our minds
Focused and calm, we will move as a unit.
I feel higher energies working in our favor!
My intellect is my best weapon
Everything will be fine, I know it.
My crystal ball shows good omens
Everything will be fine, I know!
Let's stay focused and we'll get through this battle
It was you! The one who showed me all those visions!
Free me from this corporeal carcass
I will put you all in a comatose state! I swear.
